metadata.dc:author: Valcuende Cavero, F
Castells Rodellas, A
Ramírez Bosca, A
Torres Peris, V
metadata.dc:description: The authors studied a Merkel's cell tumor with lectins. There is pattern of normal epidermis, but we see the N-acetyl-glucosamine an oligosaccharide not present in epidermis.
metadata.dc:title: Marcaje mediante lectinas de un tumor de células de Merkel.
[Lectin staining of a Merkel cell tumor].
